item.title: LOG 1.8: Missing English and The Tree of Gondor
item.description: 11th February, 2011 Hello all, I got a mobile and landline connection. From my home number I can call landlines all over europe for free! So if you are in Europe, let me know your number and we can have a little phone chat ðŸ™‚
